description: Fallback knowledge base for prompts that don't match a specific domain

bestPractices.rule: Start with context before the task
bestPractices.why: Models perform better when background information precedes the instruction
Without length guidance, local models may produce overly verbose or truncated output
A prompt for a beginner vs an expert yields very different responses

bestPractices.rule: Include at least one example when possible
bestPractices.why: Even a single input/output example significantly improves output quality
Negative constraints help prevent common failure modes in local models

templates.name: General Task
templates.context: You are a knowledgeable assistant helping with {{domain}}.
